Plot: A drama about terrorism in Apartheid-era South Africa, revolving around a policeman and a young man who carries out solo attacks against the regime.
Title: Catch a Fire
Actors: Tim Robbins, Derek Luke, Bonnie Henna, Mncedisi Shabangu
tomatoConsensus: No stranger to the political thriller, director Phillip Noyce tackles apartheid and terrorism with experienced gusto, while Derek Luke and Tim Robbins hand in nuanced performances.
